nodes.text: The Meatlump Cave was a large cave near the city of Tyrena on the Core World of Corellia. It was used as a base of operations of the technology-hating Meatlump gang.

The only entrance to the cave could be found in a rock formation that rose from a hill on the Corellian plains. The Meatlumps used torches to light the dark cave. They had brought tents, primitive tables and chairs to the cave along with simple generators. Among the Meatlumps living in the cave were Ubbal Fenn, Pech Seki and Hrath Koo.

Circa 1 ABY, the Meatlumps attacked the starship captain Osto Grissom because he transported electronics into and out of the Corellian system. Major Walden from the Corellian Security Force employed the services of an independent agent to help with the investigation. The agent tracked the Meatlumps to this location and entered the cave by force. During the ensuing fight, several members of the gang were killed, including Hrath Koo. The agent also destroyed much of the Meatlumps' equipment, including weapon caches, armor lockers and food stores to force Ubbal Fenn to reveal their reasons for the attack on Grissom. The CorSec agent also helped the Meatlump Pech Seki, who wanted to leave the gang, find his belongings that he had left behind in the cave. The spacer finally killed the Meatlumps Hrath Koo in the cave because he harassed Teilo Monnro.

The Meatlump Cave was a location Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Meatlump Cave was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006. It could be found not far from the town of Tyrena on Corellia. The player visits this cave during the quest "CorSec Case Files: Assault and Battery", which was a part of the Legacy quest, the longest quest line of the game.
